publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2043 Richard Baker: Job Losses in Aberdeen—That the Parliament regrets the loss of 200 jobs at Richard’s Textiles Mill in Aberdeen and calls on the Scottish Executive to support the relevant local agencies, including the city council and Amicus trade union, in working to address the negative impact that this will have on the local economy and in assisting those workers who have lost their jobs in such difficult circumstances to find employment.
S2M-2043 Job Losses in Aberdeen (lodged on 19 November 2004) Brian Adam*
S2M-2043 Job Losses in Aberdeen (lodged on 19 November 2004) Alex Neil*
S2M-2043 Job Losses in Aberdeen (lodged on 19 November 2004) Elaine Smith*
